conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: extruded walls with thickness, visible floor plane, angled/isometric viewpoint, and ceiling/roof removed to expose interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion (height + thickness) with clear room volumes and clean wall corners; cutaway is clean and readable with only minor simplification of some openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room arrangement matches (dining left, kitchen top-left/center, living right, bedroom bottom-left, bath core, stairs bottom-right). Minor discrepancies: entrance/foyer definition and bath sub-zoning (wash area vs toilet) appear simplified/shifted; some door locations/leaf swings not explicitly represented.

interior_elements.notes: Key furnishings present and placed plausibly: dining table/chairs, kitchen counters/appliances, sofa/coffee table, bed, and bathroom fixtures; scales and orientations generally consistent with the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Good differentiation of walls/floors and openings with clean materials; interior is visible with adequate lighting. Slight ambiguity in some openings/doors due to simplified representation.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom core zoning appears simplified compared to the 2D plan (wash area vs toilet partitioning/door relationships not perfectly matched).
Door details (exact placement and swing) are not consistently represented, reducing verifiability of opening accuracy against the 2D plan.

summary: A true, clean cutaway 3D conversion with largely faithful room layout and furnishings, with minor inaccuracies/simplifications in the entrance and bathroom partitioning and door/opening details.
